<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t Buf&#91;16&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Temp, Opcode;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NeedCopy = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A LineDelta of INT64&#95;MAX is a signal that this is actually a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DW&#95;LNE&#95;end&#95;sequence. We cannot use special opcodes here, since we want the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;sequence to emit the matrix entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LineDelta == <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#ad0d744f05898e32d01f73f8af3cd2071">INT64&#95;MAX</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AddrDelta == MaxSpecialAddrDelta)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNS&#95;const&#95;add&#95;pc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AddrDelta) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNS&#95;advance&#95;pc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(Buf, Buf + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad0f8c0e82cde3bb0849fc59e3510f05a">encodeULEB128</a>(AddrDelta, Buf));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNS&#95;extended&#95;op);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNE&#95;end&#95;sequence);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bias the line delta by the base.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Temp = LineDelta - Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#afddded28f79b1eccb3a948a4bdd0f6a3">DWARF2LineBase</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the line increment is out of range of a special opcode, we must encode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it with DW&#95;LNS&#95;advance&#95;line.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Temp &gt;= Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#ac75e30002379b9f61625bc8d2b4b1919">DWARF2LineRange</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Temp + Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#aa098ab41af3f8cee8b1939003d55a776">DWARF2LineOpcodeBase</a> &gt; 255) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNS&#95;advance&#95;line);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(Buf, Buf + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac21006e81ffbbc79e8e51e44f7878053">encodeSLEB128</a>(LineDelta, Buf));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LineDelta = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Temp = 0 - Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#afddded28f79b1eccb3a948a4bdd0f6a3">DWARF2LineBase</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NeedCopy = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use DW&#95;LNS&#95;copy instead of a &quot;line +0, addr +0&quot; special opcode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LineDelta == 0 &amp;&amp; AddrDelta == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNS&#95;copy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bias the opcode by the special opcode base.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Temp += Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#aa098ab41af3f8cee8b1939003d55a776">DWARF2LineOpcodeBase</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid overflow when addr&#95;delta is large.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AddrDelta &lt; 256 + MaxSpecialAddrDelta) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try using a special opcode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Opcode = Temp + AddrDelta &#42; Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#ac75e30002379b9f61625bc8d2b4b1919">DWARF2LineRange</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode &lt;= 255) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Opcode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try using DW&#95;LNS&#95;const&#95;add&#95;pc followed by special op.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Opcode = Temp + (AddrDelta - MaxSpecialAddrDelta) &#42; Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#ac75e30002379b9f61625bc8d2b4b1919">DWARF2LineRange</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp;context = MCOS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a61c979932b890df773ce75013b76708b">getContext</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Sections = context.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#a0ffd38472bf725df4e4c3cac8c0ad771">getGenDwarfSectionSyms</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MCOS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#ac4f84451dc4abc997c960d484953b1d2">switchSection</a>(context.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#a01d6d82d18a5da901c50a546932c4264">getObjectFileInfo</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectfileinfo/#ae17df2cce5c5b2cb1688d22f2d90820c">getDwarfARangesSection</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UnitLengthBytes =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a0b741aef91502fa04c0f5265a58ba45c">dwarf::getUnitLengthFieldByteSize</a>(context.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#ae871de84d03670534d73ae7448b6b6d9">getDwarfFormat</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OffsetSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#aa234436b20c856bcf616330ffcad6939">dwarf::getDwarfOffsetByteSize</a>(context.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#ae871de84d03670534d73ae7448b6b6d9">getDwarfFormat</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This will be the length of the .debug&#95;aranges section, first account for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the size of each item in the header (see below where we emit these items).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a> = UnitLengthBytes + 2 + OffsetSize + 1 + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Figure the padding after the header before the table of address and size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pairs who&#39;s values are PointerSize&#39;ed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasminfo">MCAsmInfo</a> &#42;asmInfo = context.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#aa3beac794c4afb5b1fb6d06cb7786587">getAsmInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AddrSize = asmInfo-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasminfo/#affd5fd4fc8ca1b0f483c51543e58108d">getCodePointerSize</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pad = 2 &#42; AddrSize - (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a> &amp; (2 &#42; AddrSize - 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pad == 2 &#42; AddrSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Pad = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a> += Pad;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the size of the pair of PointerSize&#39;ed values for the address and size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of each section we have in the table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a> += 2 &#42; AddrSize &#42; Sections.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And the pair of terminating zeros.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a> += 2 &#42; AddrSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit the header for this section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (context.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#ae871de84d03670534d73ae7448b6b6d9">getDwarfFormat</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a79a43a947d26afb3f2a388f2f7a3a8c8a34b4d38e06d609b405f4a79c223ed8d2">dwarf::DWARF64</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The DWARF64 mark.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MCOS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#acc3817979bc871dba942b87773da1cc0">emitInt32</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#af37a255a9a1f06e51c27b3a5a5c7baf4adc3aedef0caeccf6d845a430da6d3f8d">dwarf::DW&#95;LENGTH&#95;DWARF64</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The 4 (8 for DWARF64) byte length not including the length of the unit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// length field itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MCOS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a971830cc1546210be8cc86fa568be8d0">emitIntValue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a> - UnitLengthBytes, OffsetSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The 2 byte version, which is 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MCOS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a9d412a2cef594fc0f45de176d51fee3b">emitInt16</a>(2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The 4 (8 for DWARF64) byte offset to the compile unit in the .debug&#95;info</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the start of the .debug&#95;info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InfoSectionSymbol)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MCOS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a7865bd61cd2c65b2d94c58dd1523bb75">emitSymbolValue</a>(InfoSectionSymbol, OffsetSize,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Align the header with the padding if needed, before we put out the table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; Pad; i++)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now emit the table of pairs of PointerSize&#39;ed values for the section</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When generating dwarf for assembly source files this is called when symbol</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for a label is created.  If this symbol is not a temporary and is in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// section that dwarf is being generated for, save the needed info to create</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a dwarf label.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcgendwarflabelentry/#a741d0c6e829f284182bd9bbef0362e2d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcgendwarflabelentry/#a741d0c6e829f284182bd9bbef0362e2d">MCGenDwarfLabelEntry::Make</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;Symbol, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer">MCStreamer</a> &#42;MCOS,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f3f23062c5d5636bee27c54f4a407f0">SrcMgr</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We won&#39;t create dwarf labels for temporary symbols.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Symbol-&gt;isTemporary())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp;context = MCOS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a61c979932b890df773ce75013b76708b">getContext</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We won&#39;t create dwarf labels for symbols in sections that we are not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generating debug info for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!context.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#a0ffd38472bf725df4e4c3cac8c0ad771">getGenDwarfSectionSyms</a>().count(MCOS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#ae1b3cf074436ef5b527071540e13bd58">getCurrentSectionOnly</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The dwarf label&#39;s name does not have the symbol name&#39;s leading</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// underbar if any.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name = Symbol-&gt;getName();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Name.starts&#95;with(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#95;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Name = Name.substr(1, Name.size()-1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the dwarf file number to be used for the dwarf label.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FileNumber = context.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#a8628c8e12fcc26b3fbb4edf01a01fa82">getGenDwarfFileNumber</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finding the line number is the expensive part which is why we just don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass it in as for some symbols we won&#39;t create a dwarf label.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurBuffer = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f3f23062c5d5636bee27c54f4a407f0">SrcMgr</a>.FindBufferContainingLoc(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LineNumber = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f3f23062c5d5636bee27c54f4a407f0">SrcMgr</a>.FindLineNumber(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>, CurBuffer);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We create a temporary symbol for use for the AT&#95;high&#95;pc and AT&#95;low&#95;pc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values so that they don&#39;t have things like an ARM thumb bit from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original symbol. So when used they won&#39;t get a low bit set after</span></CodeLine>
